사이오닉 아이템

PSIONIC ITEMS

아이템 사용

USING ITEMS

To use a psionic item, it must be activated, although sometimes activation is accomplished simply by picking up an item or putting it on. Some items, once they are carried or worn, function constantly. In most cases, using an item requires a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격. By contrast, power completion items (see below) are treated just like powers in 전투 and do provoke 기회 공격.

Activating a psionic item is a standard action unless the item 묘사 indicates otherwise. The 구현 시간 of a power is the time required to activate the same power in an item, whether it’s a power stone, a dorje, or a psionic tattoo, unless the item 묘사 specifically states otherwise.

The four ways to activate 사이오닉 아이템 are described below.

Power Completion: This is the activation method for 파워스톤. A power stone holds a power that is mostly finished. All that’s left to do is 공연 the short, simple, finishing parts of the manifestation (the final mental coda, as it were). To use a power completion item safely, a character must be of high enough 레벨 in the appropriate class to manifest the power already. If he can’t already manifest the power, there’s a chance he’ll make a mistake (see Brainburn in the power stone 묘사). Activating a power completion item is a standard action and provokes 기회 공격 exactly as manifesting a power does.

Powers stored in power completion items are usually not augmented, because the 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum necessary to manifest the stored power. However, an item’s 묘사 may specify otherwise (some 파워스톤 have 구현자 레벨 higher than the minimum required to manifest the stored power, and are then assumed to be augmented as well).

Power 신관: This is the activation method for 도르제 and 사이크라운. It requires the special 지식 of power manifestation that a character of the appropriate class would know, and the formation of the appropriate 명령 thought. If a power is on a character’s 파워 목록, the character knows how to use a power 신관 item that stores that power. The user must still determine what power is stored in the item before she can activate it. Activating a power 신관 item is a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격.

Powers stored in power 신관 items are not augmented. Such powers are assumed to be stored in the item at the minimum 구현자 레벨 necessary to manifest the power. However, certain items may specify a higher 구현자 레벨 than necessary. If such an item holds a power that deals hit point 피해, the power is assumed to be augmented to the maximum allowed by the power and the 구현자 레벨.

명령 Thought: If no activation method is suggested either in the psionic item 묘사 or by the nature of the item, assume that a 명령 thought is needed to activate it. 명령 thought activation means that a character mentally projects a thought, and the item activates. No other special 지식 is needed. Activating a 명령 thought psionic item is a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격.

Sometimes the 명령 thought to activate an item is mentally imprinted within it and is whispered into the mind of a creature who picks it up. Other items are silent, but a 지식 (사이오닉) or 지식 (history) check might be useful in helping to 식별 명령 thoughts. A successful DC 30 check is needed to come up with the 명령 thought in this case. The power psionic 식별 reveals 명령 thoughts.

Powers stored in 명령 thought items are usually not augmented, because the 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum possible to manifest the stored power.

Use-Activated: This type of psionic item simply has to be used to activate. Use activation is generally straightforward and self-explanatory.

Many use-activated items are objects that a character wears. Some items made for wearing must still be activated. Although this activation sometimes requires a 명령 thought (see above), usually it means mentally willing the activation to happen  (a free action). The 묘사 of an item states whether a 명령 thought is needed in such a case.

Unless stated otherwise, activating a use-activated psionic item is either a standard action or not an action at all and does not provoke 기회 공격, unless the use involves performing an action that provokes 기회 공격 in itself. If the use of the item takes time before a psionic effect occurs, then use activation is a standard action. If the item’s activation is subsumed in its use and takes no extra time, use activation is not an action at all.

Use activation doesn’t mean that if you use an item, you automatically know what it can do. You must know (or at least guess) what the item can do and then use the item to activate it, unless the benefit of the item comes automatically.

Powers stored in use-activated items are usually not augmented, because the 구현자 레벨 of such an item is assumed to be the minimum possible to manifest the stored power.

사이오닉 아이템이 가진 힘에 대한 내성 굴림

SAVING THROWS AGAINST PSIONIC ITEM POWERS

사이오닉 아이템 produce 사이오닉 파워. The DC of a 내성 굴림 against a power from a psionic item is always 10 + the 레벨 of the power or effect + the ability modifier of the minimum ability score needed to manifest that 레벨 of power.

Another way to figure the same number is to multiply the power’s 레벨 by 1-1/2 and add 10 to the result.

사이크라운 are an exception to the rule. Treat the 내성 굴림 as if the wielder manifested the power, including 시전자 레벨 and all modifiers to save DC.

Some 사이오닉 아이템 take advantage of the fact that powers can be augmented to increase their 내성 굴림 DCs. These items are special and have their cost to create and 시장 가격 calculated using the manifester’s 레벨 instead of the power’s 레벨.

Most item 묘사 give 내성 굴림 DCs for various effects, particularly when the effect has no exact power equivalent (making its 레벨 otherwise difficult to quickly determine).

사이오닉 아이템의 피해

DAMAGING PSIONIC ITEMS

A psionic item doesn’t need to make a 내성 굴림 unless it is unattended, it is specifically targeted by the effect, or its wielder rolls a natural 1 on his 내성 굴림. 사이오닉 아이템 should always get a save against powers or 주문 that might deal 피해 to them—even against 공격 from which a mundane item would normally get no chance to save. All types of psionic item 내성 굴림—Fortitude, Reflex, and Will—are calculated the same way: The item’s 내성 굴림 bonus equals 2 + 1/2 its 구현자 레벨 (round down). The only exceptions to this rule are intelligent 사이오닉 아이템, which make Will 내성 굴림 based on their own 지혜 scores.

A psionic item, unless otherwise noted, takes 피해 as a normal item of the same type. A damaged psionic item continues to function, but if it is destroyed, all its psionic power is lost.

아이템 수리

REPAIRING ITEMS

Some 사이오닉 아이템 (especially 사이오닉 무기 and 방패) may take 피해 over the course of an adventure. It costs no more to repair a psionic item with the 제작 skill than it does to repair its nonpsionic counterpart. The 완전 수리 spell can repair a damaged—but not completely broken— psionic item.

지능있는 아이템

INTELLIGENT ITEMS

Some 사이오닉 아이템, particularly 무기, have an 지능 all their own. Only permanent 사이오닉 아이템 (as opposed to those that are single-use items, those that have 돌격, or those that store 파워 포인트) can be intelligent. (This means that 사이오닉 문신, 파워스톤, and 도르제, among other items, are never intelligent.) In general, less than 1% of 사이오닉 아이템 have 지능.

저주 받은 아이템

CURSED ITEMS

Some 사이오닉 아이템 are cursed—incorrectly made, or corrupted by outside forces. 저주 받은 아이템 might be particularly dangerous to the user, or they might be normal items with a minor f law, an inconvenient requirement, or an unpredictable nature. Randomly generated items are cursed 5% of the time.

충전과 여러번 사용

CHARGES AND MULTIPLE USES

Some items are limited in power by the number of 돌격 they hold or the number of 파워 포인트 they contain. Normally, charged items (such as 도르제) have 50 돌격 at most. If such an item is found as a random part of a 전리품, roll d% and divide by 2 to determine the number of 돌격 left (round down, minimum 1).

Similarly, items that contain 파워 포인트 (such as 사이크라운) have a number of points equal to 50 x the 구현자 레벨 of the creator. If such an item is found as a random part of a 전리품, roll d% and divide by 2 to determine the number by which the 구현자 레벨 is multiplied (round down, minimum 1).

시장 가격 given on the tables are always for fully charged or fully powered items. (When an item is created, it is fully charged or fully powered.) For an item that’s worthless when its 돌격 or 파워 포인트 달리기 out (which is the case for almost all charged or powered items), the value of the partially used item is proportional to the number of 돌격 left. For an item that has usefulness in addition to its 돌격, only part of the item’s value is based on the number of 돌격 left.

Some items are single-use and expendable. Such items can often be found in sets or groups.

사이오닉 캐릭터를 위한 마법 아이템

사이오닉 아이템 설명

PSIONIC ITEM DESCRIPTIONS

In the following sections, each type of psionic item, such as 갑옷 or 사이오닉 문신, has a general 묘사, followed by 묘사 of specific items.

General 묘사 include notes on activation, random generation, and other information. The 방어도, hardness, 히트 포인트, and break DC are given for typical examples of some types of 사이오닉 아이템. The 방어도 assumes that the item is unattended and includes a –5 penalty for the item’s effective 민첩 of 0. If a creature holds the item, use the creature’s 민첩 modifier as an adjustment to 방어도 in place of the –5 penalty.

Some individual items, notably those that simply store 사이오닉 파워, don’t get full-blown 묘사. Simply reference the power’s 묘사. Assume that the power is manifested at the minimum 레벨 required to manifest it, unless otherwise noted. Increasing the 구현자 레벨 so increases the cost of the item; see Table: Estimating Magic Item Gold Piece Value,substituting “spell” for “power” and “시전자 레벨” for “구현자 레벨” as appropriate. The main reason to make the 구현자 레벨 higher, or course, would be to increase the potency of the power. Raising the 구현자 레벨 is common for powers such as 영적 구조물, the 지속시간 of which increases with the 레벨 of the manifester.

Items with full 묘사 have their 능력 detailed, and each of the following aspects of these items is summarized at the end of the 묘사.

Aura: Most of the time, a 사이오닉 감지 power will reveal the 분야 associated with a psionic item and the 근력 of the aura an item emits. This information (when applicable) is given at the beginning of the item’s notational entry in the form of a phrase. See the 사이오닉 감지 power 묘사 for more information.

구현자 레벨: The next entry in the summary indicates the 레벨 of the creator (or the 구현자 레벨 of the powers placed within the item, if this 레벨 is lower than the actual 레벨 of the creator). The 구현자 레벨 provides the item’s 내성 굴림 bonus, as well as 거리 and other 레벨-dependent aspects of the powers of the item (if variable).

It also determines the 레벨 that must be contended with should the item come under the effect of a 사이오닉 무효화 power or a similar situation. This information is given in the form “ML x,” where “ML” is an abbreviation for manifester

레벨 and “x” is an ordinal number representing the 구현자 레벨 itself.

For 사이오닉 문신, 파워스톤, and 도르제, the creator can set the 구현자 레벨 of an item at any number high enough to manifest the stored power and not higher than her own 구현자 레벨. For other 사이오닉 아이템, the item itself determines the 구현자 레벨. In this case, the creator’s 구현자 레벨 must be as high as the item’s 구현자 레벨 (and 전제조건 may effectively put a higher minimum on the creator’s 레벨).

전제조건: Certain 필요조건 must be met in order for a character to create a psionic item. These include 특기, powers, and 기타 필요조건 such as 레벨, 성향, and race or kind. The 전제조건 for creation of an item are given in the summary immediately following the item’s 구현자 레벨.

A power prerequisite can be provided by a character who knows the power, or through the use of a power completion or power 신관 psionic item or a psi-like ability that produces the desired power effect. For each day that passes during the creation process, the creator must expend one power completion item (such as a power stone) or 1 돌격 from a power 신관 item (such as a dorje), if either of those objects is used to supply a prerequisite.

It is possible for more than one character to cooperate in the creation of an item, with each participant providing one or more of the 전제조건. In some cases, cooperation may even be necessary, such as if one character knows some of the powers necessary to create an item and another character knows the rest.

If two or more characters cooperate to create an item, they must agree among themselves who will be considered the creator for the 목적 of determinations where the creator’s 레벨 must be known. (It’s sensible, although not mandatory, for the highest-레벨 character involved to be considered the creator.) The character designated as the creator pays the experience points required to make the item.

Typically, a list of 전제조건 includes one feat and one or more powers (or some other requirement in addition to the feat). When two powers at the end of a list are separated by “or,” one of those powers is required in addition to every other power mentioned prior to the last two.

시장 가격: This gold piece value, given in the summary following the word “Price,” represents the price someone should expect to pay to buy the item. 시장 가격 are also included on the random generation tables for easy reference. The 시장 가격 of an item that can be constructed with a psionic item creation feat is usually equal to the base price + the price for any 구성요소 (특수 재료 or experience point expenditure).

Cost to Create: The cost in gold pieces and experience points to create the item is given in the summary following the word “Cost.” This information appears only for items with 구성요소 (material or experience points) that make their 시장 가격 higher than their base prices. The cost to create includes the costs derived from the base cost plus the cost of the 구성요소. Items without 구성요소 do not have a “Cost” entry. For them, the 시장 가격 and base price are the same. The cost in gold pieces is 1/2 the 시장 가격, and the cost in experience points is 1/25 the 시장 가격.

Weight: The notational entry for many items ends with a value for the item’s weight. When a weight figure is not given, the item has no weight worth noting (for the 목적 of determining how much of a load a character can carry).

갑옷 및 방패

ARMOR AND SHIELDS

In general, psionic 갑옷 및 방패 follow the rules for the equivalent 마법 아이템, as far as enhancement bonuses, stacking, and other base 능력 are concerned. An enhancement bonus is treated the same way regardless of whether magic or 사이오닉 created it.

Psionic 갑옷 및 방패 differ from standard and magical equivalents in that psionic 갑옷 및 방패 incorporate one or more crystals into their 제작. Particularly powerful 갑옷 및 방패 may be entirely composed of brightly hued or transparent crystals.

특성: Roll d%. An 01 result indicates the item is intelligent, an 02–31 result indicates that the 명령 thought (if any) is psionically imprinted and whispers itself into the user’s mind on acquisition, and 32–100 indicates no 특성.

지능있는 아이템 have extra 능력 and sometimes also extraordinary powers and special 목적. Substitute manifesting for spellcasting as required.

사이오닉 갑옷 및 방패 특수 능력 설명
Psionic Armor and Shield Special Ability Descriptions

Most psionic 갑옷 및 방패 have only enhancement bonuses. Such items can also have one or more of the 특수 능력 detailed below. 갑옷 or a 방패 with a special ability must have at least a +1 enhancement bonus.

Aporter: As a standard action, a suit of aporter 갑옷 or an aporter 방패 운송수단 the wearer and her 장비 to any 감지 within 800 feet that she can visualize or specify, as the psionic 차원의 문 power. The 갑옷 or 방패 can 운송수단 the wearer in this fashion twice per day.

Moderate 시공간초월; ML 10th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, psionic 차원의 문; Price +40,320 gp.

Averter: On 명령, up to three times per day, any creature to whom the wearer presents an averter 방패 must succeed on a DC 14 Will save or be overcome by a powerful 혐오 to the wielder (actually the 방패), and will not approach within 30 feet. This is a mind-affecting compulsion effect, as the 혐오 power.

Faint 정신감응; ML 5th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 혐오; Price +12,960 gp.

Ectoplasmic: As a standard action, ectoplasmic 갑옷 converts itself, its wearer, and all the wearer’s 장비 into 심령 형태 for up to 5 minutes once per day, as the power of the same 이름. In this semisolid state, the wearer gains 피해 축소 10/사이오닉.

Faint 정신적대사작용; ML 5th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 심령 형태; Price +10,800 gp.

Floating: This kind of 갑옷 is psionically buoyant in water or a similar liquid, negating the normal penalty for wearing 갑옷 when making 수영 checks. Additionally, it grants a +4 circumstance bonus on 수영 checks.

Faint 시공간초월; ML 4th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 부유; Price +4,000 gp.

Gleaming: This kind of 갑옷 is usually made of crystal, though it doesn’t have to be. Gleams and flashes from the 갑옷 give the wearer and his 갑옷 a “fuzzy” appearance, granting the wearer 은폐.

Faint 재귀창조; ML 5th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 아모파 감추기; Price +3 bonus.

Heartening: This kind of 방패 grants the wearer up to 5 임시 히트 포인트 per day on 명령. These 임시 히트 포인트 fade after 4 minutes. The wearer can activate this power as an immediate action at any time.

Faint 정신적대사작용; ML 4th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 활력; Price +720 gp.

Landing: A suit of 갑옷 with this capability allows the wearer to ignore any 피해 dealt by the first 60 feet of a fall. Regardless of the height of a fall, the wearer always lands on her feet.

Faint 시공간초월; ML 4th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 닻줄; Price +4,000 gp.

Linked: This kind of 갑옷 or 방패 allows the wearer to form a 텔레파시 결속 with other wearers of linked 갑옷 or 방패 within 10 miles. This ability is otherwise similar to the 정신연결 power.

Moderate 정신감응; ML 6th; 사이오닉 무기와 갑옷 제작, 정신연결; Price +6,000 gp.

Manifester: This kind of 방패 generates 3 파워 포인트 once per day that the wearer can use when manifesting a power he knows. These 파워 포인트 must all be used on the same power. As usual, a psionic character cannot pay a power’s cost with 파워 포인트 from more than one source, so the 파워 포인트 in the 방패 must be used for discrete manifestations.

Occasionally, a dorje is decorated with carvings or inscribed 달리기 along a face of the crystal. A typical dorje has AC 7, 7 히트 포인트, a hardness of 8, and a break DC of 18.

(If the power being manifested has a 구현 시간 longer than 1 standard action, however, it takes that long to manifest the power from a dorje.) The user must have the power on his class list, even if he knows the 명령 thought. 도르제 are normally created at the minimum 구현자 레벨 required to manifest the power, and powers that can be augmented are not augmented when stored in a dorje. In this case, the dorje that holds an augmentable power is augmented, to the limit of the 구현자 레벨 and the power’s augmentation maximums, if any. 파워스톤

POWER STONES

A power stone stores a power (or collection of powers). A stored power can be used only once, “flushing” the stone. Using a power stone is basically like manifesting a power.

Physical 묘사: A power stone is a thumb-sized chunk of crystal that possesses a barely detectable interior glow if it holds a low-레벨 power. A stone imprinted with more than one power or a higher-레벨 power glows more brightly, but never enough to provide illumination in its own right. A typical power stone has AC 7, 5 히트 포인트, a hardness of 8, and a break DC of 20.

Activation: To activate a power stone, a manifester must mentally address it, as described below. Once the power is known, the power stone is treated as a power completion item, except as noted below.

Addressing the Stone: A power stone must be “addressed” before a character can use it or know exactly what power it contains. Doing this requires a successful 사이크래프트 check (DC 15 + power 레벨). Once a particular power stone has been addressed, it is not necessary to do so again. Addressing a power stone in advance lets a character proceed directly to the next step when the time comes to use it.

Using a stone’s stored power after addressing the stone requires holding the stone and willing the power’s manifestation, as if manifesting a power normally (a standard action). Activating a power stone is subject to disruption just as manifesting a power normally would be.

Additionally, the user must meet the following 필요조건.

• The user must have the power on his or her class list.

• The user must have the requisite key ability score.

If the user meets these 필요조건 and has a 구현자 레벨 at least equal to the power’s 구현자 레벨, she can automatically manifest the stored power without a check. If she meets both 필요조건 but her own 레벨 is lower than the power stone’s 구현자 레벨, she has to make a 구현자 레벨 check (1d20 + user’s 레벨), against a DC equal to the power stone’s 구현자 레벨 +1, to manifest the power successfully. On a failure, the user must succeed on a DC 5 지혜 check to avoid brainburn (see below). A natural roll of 1 on this check is always a failure.

Determine Effect: A power successfully manifested from a power stone works exactly as if manifested normally. Assume the power stone’s 구현자 레벨 is always the minimum 레벨 required to manifest the power for the character who imprinted the stone, unless the creator specifically desires otherwise.

A power stone’s glow fades when its stored power is flushed.

Brainburn: When something goes awry, the user of a power stone improperly manifests the stored power. The resultant psionic surge persists for 1d4 rounds, unless the power stone is flung farther than 100 feet away or is destroyed. This surge deals 1d6 points of 피해 per power stored per round and arcs across multiple targets, similar to 에너지 흐름, except the 피해 type isn’t specified. The user is the primary target, and one nearby ally is the secondary target (chosen at random).

The 구현자 레벨 for a standard power stone is the minimum 구현자 레벨 needed to manifest the power (unless otherwise specified).

PSICROWNS

A psicrown is a special headband that stores several powers. Unlike 도르제, which can contain a wide variety of powers, each psicrown is of a certain kind and holds specific powers. Unless otherwise stated, a psicrown has 파워 포인트 equal to 50 x its 구현자 레벨 when created. These 파워 포인트 can be spent only on the powers that are contained in the psicrown.

Physical 묘사: A typical psicrown is large enough to fit on the head of a Medium creature. Some 사이크라운 are actually crownlike and heavily adorned, while others are simple headbands with crystal centerpieces. All 사이크라운 weigh less than 1 pound. Most 사이크라운 are metallic, but one could potentially be composed of any material. Metallic 사이크라운 have AC 10, 10 히트 포인트, hardness 8, and a break DC of 28. 사이크라운 made of psionically reinforced silk have AC 7, 10 히트 포인트, hardness 2, and a break DC of 24. 사이크라운 can be made from other, more exotic materials, but all have at least the 근력 and durability of 사이크라운 made of psionically reinforced silk.

Activation: 사이크라운 use the power 신관 activation method, so manifesting a power from a psicrown is usually a standard action that does not provoke 기회 공격. (If the power being manifested, however, has a longer 구현 시간 than 1 standard action, it takes that long to manifest the power from a psicrown.) When activating a psicrown, the user spends 파워 포인트 contained in the psicrown on any one of the psicrown’s powers. Powers activated from a psicrown can be augmented with additional 파워 포인트 from the psicrown itself, so long as the total number of 파워 포인트 spent does not exceed the user’s 구현자 레벨. The user can’t manifest a power from a psicrown using his own 파워 포인트.

사이오닉 문신

PSIONIC TATTOOS

사이오닉 문신 are designs scribed on the skin that manifest powers on their wearers. The wearer doesn’t get to make any decisions about the tattoo’s effect—the manifester who scribed it has already done so.

사이오닉 문신 can vary in size, but a creature can wear only a total of twenty tattoos at one time—attempting to add one more than this maximum causes all previously scribed tattoos to simultaneously activate. A psionic tattoo fades away after use.

Physical 묘사: A typical psionic tattoo is a colorful pattern of tiny, interlacing lines within a larger design. This design can be as simple as a circle or a star, or as complex as an artist 소원 to make it. Once it is scribed, a tattoo’s design does not change. A psionic tattoo usually 엄폐 an 범위 of skin no more than 5 inches in diameter (larger ones could be designed, but would have no added effect).

Scribing and Transferring Tattoos: The 구현자 레벨 of a psionic tattoo is the minimum 레벨 required to manifest the scribed power. A psionic tattoo can contain only powers of 3rd 레벨 or lower.

A psionic tattoo inscribed on a wearer is potentially more mobile than a mundane tattoo. As a standard action, the wearer can will the tattoo to 이동 to a different part of his body or onto the skin of any willing (or unconscious) living creature he touches. If the wearer of a psionic tattoo is rendered unconscious or is slain, another sentient creature can touch the tattoo while willing it to leave the previous wearer and apply itself to the new creature as a standard action. 사이오닉 문신 cannot overlay one another.

Identifying 사이오닉 문신: In addition to the standard methods of identification, the wearer of a tattoo can concentrate on it and attempt to gain some sense of how it would feel if activated. A successful DC 13 지능 check provides a hint to the tattoo’s effect.

Activation: A psionic tattoo produces its effect when touched by its wearer and willed to do so. This activity, called “tapping” the tattoo, is a standard action that provokes 기회 공격. A psionic tattoo fades away after use.

The following rules govern the use of 사이오닉 문신.

• A creature must have an appropriate physical surface on which to scribe the pattern (thus, incorporeal creatures or creatures with impermanent flesh, such as 불의 정령, cannot use 사이오닉 문신).

• Tapping a psionic tattoo provokes 기회 공격. A successful 공격 (including grappling 공격) against the wearer forces a 집중 check. A wearer who fails this check cannot concentrate effectively on the tattoo to use it. The tattoo remains untapped, and the wearer can make another attempt.

• A character can 신관 the effects of another’s psionic tattoo if the other wearer is unconscious. It is a full-round action to find, touch, and concentrate on an unconscious creature’s tattoo in order to tap it.

The 구현자 레벨 for a standard psionic tattoo is the minimum 구현자 레벨 needed to manifest the power (unless otherwise specified).

In addition to 사이오닉 아이템 with imbedded powers, some substances have innate special properties.

Crystal, Deep: Deep crystal is crystal of above-average quality found at the hearts of large veins or deposits of mundane crystal (see below). Deep crystal is renowned for its 근력 and its psionically resonant nature. Mundane crystal is used for many items of psionic manufacture, such as 도르제, 파워스톤, and 정신결정. Deep crystal is a better grade.

As a free action that does not provoke 기회 공격, the wielder can channel psionic power into a melee weapon or ranged weapon made of deep crystal. For 2 파워 포인트, the deep crystal weapon deals an extra 2d6 points of 피해. The weapon will stay charged for 1 minute or until it scores its next hit. Bows, crossbows, and slings bestow this power on their ammunition. All missile 무기 lose this effect if they miss. However, they may be recovered and charged again.

Any weapon made of deep crystal costs 1,000 gp more than its noncrystal counterpart. Any item could potentially be made out of deep crystal. Because deep crystal 갑옷 is considered to be made out of metal, 드루이드 cannot wear it.

Deep crystal has 30 히트 포인트 per inch of thickness and a hardness of 10.

무기 and 갑옷 made of mundane crystal cost the same amount to make as their masterwork counterparts. Any item could potentially be made with mundane crystal. Because mundane crystal 갑옷 is considered to be made out of metal, 드루이드 cannot wear it.
